title: If I stood up right after Imam gave Salam to the right, is my prayer invalid? | assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: uh faizan from india um he said that when the imam made the first salaam to the right i stood up and you said that my prayer is invalid i did not say that your prayer is invalid you did something wrong so those who stand up before the imam offers the second to sleep on the left to the left they have done something wrong their prayer is still valid in sha allah
